title: AppHealthStatus contains information about the currently observed health state of an application

lastTransitionTime.description:
Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct
marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many
of the factory methods that the time package offers.

+protobuf.options.marshal=false
+protobuf.as=Timestamp
+protobuf.options.(gogoproto.goproto_stringer)=false

message.description: Deprecated: this field is not used and will be removed in a future release.
message.title: Message is a human-readable informational message describing the health status

status.title: Status holds the status code of the application
